document_data.mainbody:
The feeblemind field was an especially vicious spell developed by Tsjancy Yildree during his time as the Magister, between  and . After his death, it became a lost spell, by the will of Mystra.
The spell disabled anyone who was maneuvered into it, likely through an effect akin to the feeblemind spell.This is not certain, and it is taken to be the case only because of the spells name. The spell is thus classed as an enchantment for the purposes of this wiki.
After Tsjancys death, the spell became a lost spell, by the will of Mystra.
